name: Corporate Cactus Practice
description:
Made for the  CACTUS #bitsyjam with #bitsy.

HOW TO PLAY:

  • Keyboard controls: Use WASD or arrow keys to interact with the iCactai
  • Touch Controls: swipe in the direction you wish to interact with the iCactai

Thanks to:

  •  #bitsysavior and #multicolorbitsy for making my life easier
  • Music by Abstraction  https://abstractionmusic.bandcamp.com/album/three-red-hearts

(I only had 48 hours to finish this jam annnnd this is the best my sleep-deprived brain could deliver)
